name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Johnathan ROBINS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Johnathan ROBINS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of January 2012, the pro se Petition to Remove Counsel and Go Pro Se and Terminate Direct Appeal is DENIED. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
35 A.3d 1206
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Johnathan ROBINS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 20, 2012.
No. 517 EAL 2011.
